example.name: conflagrate-v
example.text: When internal conditions have completely destroyed any ability of defense hoards of hostiles will pour across the southern border and nuclear-tipped missiles will conflagrate what is left of the cities.
example.arg: what is left of the cities

example.name: conflagration-n
example.text: All arguments that the Bush administration would be insane to attack Iran and risk a global conflagration for the sake of political cover run into one unavoidable truth .

example.name: conflagration-n
example.text: The conflagration of fire roared skyward several hundred feet.

example.name: conflagration-n
example.text: Will we choose to live in harmony with this planet or crash and burn in a conflagration of arrogance and disregard ?
